trails.name: Little Scraggy Trail Loop
trails.summary: A great, new flow trail at Buffalo Creek, which combined with Nice Kitty is a BC classic ride.

trails.name: Buffalo Creek Big Loop - IMBA EPIC
trails.summary: A nice tour of some of the best of Buffalo Creek - mostly smooth singletrack with some climbing.

trails.name: Buffalo Creek Loop - Pine Lake Trailhead
trails.summary: A nice tour of popular Buffalo Creek trails on the NW side of the area - from Pine Lake Park.

trails.name: Centennial Cone
trails.summary: One of the better beginner/intermediate rides in the front range.

trails.name: Betasso Preserve
trails.summary: A solid ride close to Boulder that is often ridden from town.

trails.name: Apex Park Tour
trails.summary: This technical front range ride is only possible on even numbered days but it's worth the planning!

trails.name: Staunton State Park - Full Clockwise Loop
trails.summary: A very fun, reasonable tour with beautiful scenery and perfect mix of cross-country and downhill.

trails.name: North Table Loop
trails.summary: Big climbs. Rowdy descents. Amazing 360-degree views.

trails.name: Lair O' the Bear - Bear Creek Trail
trails.summary: Mostly flowy singletrack, with a few small climbs and some very fun rock challenges.

trails.name: Hall Ranch
trails.summary: A favorite for Boulder area riders - scenery, singletrack, technical sections...  it's got it all!

trails.name: Mini-Tour of Buffalo Creek
trails.summary: A 15-mile loop of some of the best trails Buffalo Creek has to offer.

trails.name: White Ranch: Technical Descent Tour
trails.summary: A tour of the southern half of White Ranch's best features.

trails.name: Kenosha Pass to Georgia Pass and West Jefferson
trails.summary: One of the best rides in the mountains within one hour of the Front Range!
trails.conditionDetails: a little snow and lots of downed trees and foot bridges out on Jefferson creek return leg

trails.name: Alderfer/Three Sisters/Dedisse Tour
trails.summary: A tour of some pretty decent singletrack through the Dedisse and Three Sisters parks.

trails.name: Deer Creek Canyon
trails.summary: A technical downhill earned the Colorado way.

trails.name: Walker Ranch
trails.summary: A classic loop near boulder with a nice mix of technical riding, flowy descents, and scenery.

trails.name: Dakota Ridge / Red Rocks Loop from Zorro Trail
trails.summary: A great winter or after work ride.  Fast, technical and exciting.

trails.name: Ridgeline Open Space
trails.summary: Great rolling singletrack with tons of options for short and long loop rides.

trails.name: Blue Grouse - Mule Deer Loop
trails.summary: An outstanding tour of Golden Gate State Park on beautiful trail with great flow.

trails.name: Hidden Mesa
trails.summary: A nice short lollipop ride with great front range views and fun rock features to try your skills on.

trails.name: Marshall Mesa - Doudy Draw Loops
trails.summary: A nice ride close to Boulder - great views and a nice ride for advanced beginners or intermediates.

trails.name: Picture Rock/Wild Turkey Loop
trails.summary: A combination of a few of the best intermediate trails in the Boulder/Lyons area.

trails.name: Spring Brook Loop
trails.summary: The perfect introduction to riding in the Front Range of Colorado, with a little tech thrown in.

trails.name: Heil Ranch
trails.summary: A good intermediate ride relatively close to Boulder, with many options for linking to other trails.

trails.name: Phillp S. Miller Park / Miller Activity Center (MAC)
trails.summary: Awesome, flowing singletrack with good technical sections including rocks and berms.

trails.name: Green Mountain Novice Loop
trails.summary: A relatively quick loop of great singletrack with amazing views of the metro area.

trails.name: Green Mountain Intermediate Loop
trails.summary: A quick loop of Green Mountain from the West parking lot off Rooney Road.

trails.name: Dirty Bismark
trails.summary: A fun Boulder area cruise following the famous Morgul Bismarck road course.

trails.name: West Mag Backcountry Big Ride
trails.summary: The bigger and badder tour of West Magnolia featuring the School Bus Trail descent.

trails.name: Elk Meadow & Bergen Peak Loop
trails.summary: A ride leading to the top of Bergen Peak with a loop that uses the best trails for the way down.

trails.name: Indian Creek Loop - Trail #800
trails.summary: A beautiful wooded loop with great singletrack and a few linkup options for those warm summer days.

trails.name: Hildebrand Ranch
trails.summary: A good, quick singletrack loop.

trails.name: Mount Falcon and Lair O' the Bear Loop
trails.summary: A physically challenging but technically moderate loop.

trails.name: North Table Mountain Park - West Loop
trails.summary: A perfect beginner ride which combines easy climbs and easy technical sections.

trails.name: Super Betasso
trails.summary: Perhaps the most classic mountain bike ride within spitting distance of downtown Boulder.

trails.name: West Magnolia Tour
trails.summary: A perimeter tour of the maze that is the West Magnolia trail system.

trails.name: Elk Meadow/Bergen Peak Loop
trails.summary: A loop around Elk Meadow Park with great climbs, downhill, and views.

trails.name: Devil's Backbone Loop
trails.summary: More technical than strenuous, some very rocky sections.

trails.name: North Fork Lollipop
trails.summary: Beautiful bench cut singletrack with hearty climbs and fast flowy descents

trails.name: Meyer Ranch Full Loop
trails.summary: Meyer Ranch is a great route for a summer or fall loop through the trees.

trails.name: Mount Falcon - The best of the singletrack
trails.summary: A tour of all the great singletrack on Mount Falcon

trails.name: South Saint Vrain Figure 8
trails.summary: A challenging mountain link-up with a substantial downhill finish.
trails.conditionDetails: Some Mud - A little mud, but perfect otherwise.

trails.name: Hall Ranch Intermediate Loop
trails.summary: This lovely intermediate loop is perfect for those wanting a healthy dose of flow with moments of technical challenge.

trails.name: Mount Herman - Limbaugh Canyon Loop
trails.summary: An advanced Intermediate loop from Monument Preserve through Limbaugh Canyon.

trails.name: Floyd Hill Open Space
trails.summary: Moderate grade multi-use singletrack with plenty of flow and views for mountain bikers.

trails.name: North Table Mountain - South Loop
trails.summary: North Table Mountain's best loop - the linkup provides the mesa's best singletrack

trails.name: Mountain Lion
trails.summary: A challenging but rewarding trail with a great technical descent.
trails.conditionDetails: Dry - Fun ride. Burly descent near the top turns into fun creek crossings and berms lower. Great evening ride.

trails.name: Ape' Ney (Apex to Chimney)
trails.summary: A climb up the Apex system with several challenging tech sections followed by a long and fast, flowing descent.

trails.name: Kenosha Pass to Georgia Pass
trails.summary: The most commonly ridden trail from Kenosha Pass to Georgia Pass - a front range gem!
trails.conditionDetails: Snowy, Fallen Trees - Couple trees down along the route and small snow fields requiring short hike a bike at timber line. As of 6/29/20

trails.name: Ride like a Moto
trails.summary: A wild and rowdy ride through a massive burn area; not for the faint-hearted.

trails.name: Jones Pass to Herman Gulch
trails.summary: An epic, above-tree-line traverse south on the CDT from Jones Pass to the Herman Gulch trailhead.
trails.conditionDetails: Mostly Dry, Some Mud - Crossing snowfield at Jones Pass was a serious challenge.  95% clear and dry otherwise (except a few snow banks).  Adventure

trails.name: CT - Segment 3: Little Scraggy to FS-560 Wellington Lake Road
trails.summary: An awesome segment of the Colorado Trail with options to include sections of Buffalo Creek.

trails.name: Heil to Picture to Hall and Back
trails.summary: A fantastic way to link together the Heil and Hall ranch trail systems for one big ride.

trails.name: Tipperary Spruce Flume Loop
trails.summary: Highlights of the Northern Fraser Valley Trail System.

trails.name: Rhythm & Blues
trails.summary: A fine collection of West Magnolia trails - flow, rock features, jumps, rollers, berms - this has it all!

trails.name: Segment 6 Shuttle: Kenosha Pass to Gold Hill (Breckenridge)
trails.summary: One of the Colorado Trail's finest segments; alpine vistas and flawless downhills!
trails.conditionDetails: No snow just a handful of fallen trees.

trails.name: Buff Creek "Big Burrito"
trails.summary: This ride captures 3 big climbs and 3 big downhillsa "choice selection" of some the best Buffalo Creek has to offer!

trails.name: Buffalo Creek Endurance Mega-Tour
trails.summary: For the adventurous only, here's the biggest of big Buffalo Creek laps.

trails.name: Fraser West
trails.summary: A mostly singletrack ride which combines two loops via the pleasant Chainsaw trail.

trails.name: Golden Gate Full Pull
trails.summary: An epic tour of the trails on offer at Golden Gate State Park.

trails.name: Valmont Bike Park - Singletrack Hotlap
trails.summary: A quick lap of some of the fun singletrack on offer at Valmont Bike Park

trails.name: Monument Preserve Loop
trails.summary: The best moderate loop in Monument Preserve.

trails.name: Post Work Sunset Ride
trails.summary: Crank out the upper and lower loops from just off the Coal Creek bike path.

trails.name: Colorado Trail: Kenosha Pass to Lost Creek Wilderness Boundary
trails.summary: Well balanced singletrack with impressive views of endless aspen groves

trails.name: Argos to Grubstake Loop
trails.summary: A fun after work ride that includes a leg workout with a fast loop that will keep you on your toes.

trails.name: Lauren's Loop
trails.summary: A beginner friendly loop on North Table mountain with a couple spicy moments.

trails.name: Winter Park East
trails.summary: This loop climbs predominantly bike path and dirt road and descends predominantly sweet singletrack.
trails.conditionDetails: Construction on buck creek trail.  Have to find alternative route to broken thumb trail.

trails.name: West Magnolia: Winter Fat Bike Groomed Loop
trails.summary: First of its kind, Forest Service approved groomed winter access for fat biking in West Magnolia.

trails.name: Moose Meander Loop
trails.summary: Moose Meander is a short beginner/intermediate friendly trail at the Grand Lake Golf Course trailhead.

trails.name: CT - Segment 2: South Platte River to Little Scraggy
trails.summary: Stays within the Buffalo Creek Fire area for 80% of the ride and is mostly flat, gravelly and flows

trails.name: This is the correct way to ride Buff Creek.
trails.summary: With a straight forward shuttle you can hit all the best parts of Buff Creek and still get enough climbing.

trails.name: Winter Park Short Gravel Road Loop
trails.summary: Put a little gravel in your travel and take in the sights of Winter Park

trails.name: Winter Park Enduro Stage
trails.summary: A technical XC climb that leads to a stage of the Big Mountain Enduro, followed by some singletrack back to the resort.

trails.name: The Cougar Slayer
trails.summary: The course of the eponymous underground, unsanctioned, unofficial, mountain bike race/adventure.

trails.name: Floyd Hill DH Loop
trails.summary: The easier, but slightly slower way to the top of Floyd Hill, then ride down the Front Range's best DH trail.

trails.name: Indian Peaks Traverse (IPT)
trails.summary: An epic, long distance trail connecting Boulder to Winter Park, and one that is in the process of substantial upgrades!

trails.name: Deer Creek Canyon Extended Loop
trails.summary: Utilizes the recently opened Black Bear Trail to connect to the Deer Creek area, offering a long and diverse route.

trails.name: Wild's Loop
trails.summary: An extremely challenging, yet rewarding, primitive backcountry adventure.

trails.name: Hunter's Way
trails.summary: Relentless climb followed by a technical, fast descent.

trails.name: CT - Indian Creek (Waterton Canyon Alt.)
trails.summary: The perfect downhill alternative to the traditional Waterton Canyon dirt road climb.

trails.name: North Boulder Loop
trails.summary: A fun connection of bits of trail for a great whole loop in North Boulder.

trails.name: XC Loop Trail
trails.summary: A fast, flowy XC loop (clockwise) with a little of everything: climbs, switchbacks, fast, open sections. Mostly smooth.

trails.name: The N Bus Loop
trails.summary: Great tour of West Magnolia starting at the High School, which is also the last stop of the Boulder-Nederland N Bus.

trails.name: Pole Hill Road
trails.summary: A "gravel grind" on 4x4 roads that provides some great views.

trails.name: South Valley Loop
trails.summary: A great beginner-to-intermediate loop for fun or cross country training.

trails.name: North Buffalo Creek Buck-Skipper-Strawberry Loop
trails.summary: An 8.4-mile loop keeping to the north end of Buffalo Creek.

trails.name: A Short Homestead Tour
trails.summary: A history lesson and mountain biking: your two favorite things!  Well at least one of them is

trails.name: East Boulder Trail
trails.summary: An easy ride East of Boulder - great for beginners, and enjoyable for everyone.

trails.name: Front Range 40
trails.summary: Tour of some of the best riding in the Front Range.

trails.name: Bear Creek - Dakota Ridge Loop

trails.name: Sherwood From Nederland

trails.name: Little Scraggy to Pine Valley Ranch Park (Mostly) Downhill

trails.summary: An hour-long loop with a mix of green and blue singletrack with some gravel road mixed in.

trails.name: The Grind
trails.summary: Flowy singletrack on the downhill and easy doubletrack on the uphill, showcasing the Highlands Point trail system.

trails.name: Ceran St. Vrain to Miller Rock
trails.summary: A fun lollipop with great views.

trails.name: Pinewood Reservoir
trails.summary: Get that trail-to-yourself feeling at Pinewood Reservoir!

trails.name: Sugarloaf to Gordon Gulch Loop

trails.name: Coney Buchanan Loop

trails.name: Greenland & Spruce Meadows Open Space Loop

trails.name: Silver Plume to Waldorf Mine

trails.name: South Park - Burning Bear Loop

trails.summary: A good fitness ride in east Boulder County when foothills area trails are snow-covered or too wet.

trails.name: Chapman Drive Out-And-Back

trails.name: Quarry Mesa Ride
trails.summary: A short but satisfying loop around the mesa to end with some flow lines.

trails.name: North Sourdough and St. Vrain Loop

trails.summary: When you need a winter training ride and the mountain trails are thick with snow or you want to practice bikepacking.

trails.name: Waterton Canyon with Upper Loop
trails.summary: Gravel road ride with a singletrack loop for some fun ending on a gravel road.

trails.summary: An easy ride for a lazy day or to try out mountain biking.
